Name: Coptic textile
Description: A fragment of thick dark brown wool embroidered with a leaf-shaped medallion. The plant motif is surrounded by a running weave border. The ornament is in yellow wool on a dark green ground and red border, the outer scroll border is in brown-purple.Technique: plain weave ground with tapestry motif, built up shapes, curved weft, slits and 'soumak' outlining.Ends per inch (warp threads): 20.Picks per inch (weft threads): 36 over ground, 112 over tapestry.
